AI Description: libevent is a robust event notification library that provides a mechanism to execute a callback function when specific events occur on a file descriptor or after a timeout has been reached. It is designed to be highly efficient and versatile, capable of handling various types of events in a scalable manner.
Core Features: Event-Driven Programming Model, Support For Multiple Event Types (I/O, Signals, Timers), Asynchronous & Non-Blocking I/O Operations, Thread Safety & Multiplexing, Cross-Platform Compatibility
General Tags: Event Notification, Callback Functions, Scalable, Efficient
